title: Yearbook
title-note: National Council of Teachers of Mathematics

renewed-issues.note: CCE record for this renewed volume gives its title as 'Second yearbook curriculum problems in teaching mathematics' and its author as William D. Reeve.
CCE record for this renewed volume gives its title as 'The third yearbook. Selected topics in the teaching of mathematics'.

CCE record for this renewed volume gives its title as 'The fourth yearbook. Significant changes and trends in the teaching of mathematics throughout the world since 1910' and its editor as W. D. Reeve.
CCE record for this renewed volume gives its title as 'The teaching of geometry. The fifth year book' and its editor as W. D. Reeve.

additional-notes: Volumes of this annual were renewed in the CCE under Books, not Periodicals.

Some issues of this serial have distinctive titles.  Before concluding that such an issue is in the public domain, search for book renewals under its distinctive title. We have not systematically searched individual issue titles.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Eli Baum for copyright research on this title.
